definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Min2 yong4 Hang2 kong1 ju2

sentences.english: Now Russia, for at least the second time, has fired on a Chinese civilian ship.
sentences.chinese: 现在俄罗斯，至少第二次，解雇了在中国民用船。

sentences.english: The Congo people decorate their pipes with figural and geometric patterns.
sentences.chinese: 刚果人民用几和形状的样式装饰他们的烟斗。

sentences.english: Used for walls of civil architecture with artistic requirements.
sentences.chinese: 具有美观要求的民用建筑墙面。

sentences.english: Now people in the West calk a useless thing "a white elephant".
sentences.chinese: 而现在西方人则把民用的人成为“白象”。

sentences.english: These aerostats have civilian uses, too.
The heater, mainly used for civil light wave furnace.
sentences.chinese: 民用的主要用于加热器，光波炉。

sentences.english: At last, some focus in future bird-strike research is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对未来民用飞机抗鸟撞研究的发展做了展望。

sentences.english: This is a mixed civilian-military airport.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个混合民用军用机场。

sentences.english: He majors in civil engineering in a technical institute.
sentences.chinese: 他在一所工学院主修民用建筑。

sentences.english: Mercantilism thought in the civil enterprise was strong.
sentences.chinese: 商办民用企业思想浓重。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a double-door interlinking alcohol stove which belongs to the technical field of civil hardware.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型为一种双门联动酒精炉，属民用五金领域。

sentences.english: Citizens in the city's civil  buildings are all civilized.
sentences.chinese: 城市民用建筑内的市民全都得到教化。

sentences.english: Upon its closure by the USAF, the airfield became a civil airport.
sentences.chinese: 由美国空军关闭后，机场成为一个民用机场。

sentences.english: I am working on a master's degree in civil architecture.
sentences.chinese: 我在攻读民用建筑专业的硕士学位。

sentences.english: Shenyang Aircraft Corporation produces airplanes for civilian use as well as for the PLAAF.
sentences.chinese: 沉阳飞机公司生产的民用飞机使用以及解放军空军。

sentences.english: The first recorded civilian clothing factory dates from 1825.
sentences.chinese: 第一家有记载的民用服装厂可追溯到1825年。
